answerText: leks [or lekking][10] Lek mating is a class of this mating system, in which a male has exclusive mating rights with more than one female.
heading: ACF Regionals 2014 |2014 | WUSTL-Columbia B-Berkeley A  | 6 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name these congregations of male animals during breeding season, when they compete publicly for small patches of area. Common among birds, this behavior is also expressed by hammerhead bats and kakapos.
